name: gmail-mcp-server-extension
description: The Gmail MCP server offers a comprehensive set of tools for managing emails and drafts within the user's Gmail account.

tools.name: get_profile
tools.description: Get the user's profile information from their gmail account.

tools.name: list_messages
tools.description: List email messages from user's gmail account.

tools.name: get_message
tools.description: Get the specified message from user's gmail account.

tools.name: send_message
tools.description: Send an email message from user's gmail account.

tools.name: modify_message_labels
tools.description: Modify labels of a message in user's gmail account.

tools.name: trash_message
tools.description: Trash a message in user's gmail account.

tools.name: untrash_message
tools.description: Recover message from the trashed folder of a user's gmail account.

tools.name: list_drafts
tools.description: List email drafts from user's gmail account.

tools.name: get_draft
tools.description: Get the specified draft from user's gmail account.

tools.name: send_draft
tools.description: Send an existing email draft from user's gmail account.

tools.name: create_draft
tools.description: Create a draft email message in user's gmail account.

tools.name: update_draft
tools.description: Update an existing email draft in user's gmail account.

tools.name: delete_draft
tools.description: Delete the specified email draft from user's gmail account.

oauth_credentials.title: Google OAuth 2.0 Credentials
oauth_credentials.description: Path to the credentials.json file downloaded from the Google Cloud Console for OAuth 2.0 authentication.
